item.description: URGENT: ICE is taking Cambodian #refugee, genocide survivor and #journalist Phoeun You to an airport for deportation. Only a pardon from @GavinNewsom can stop this. Call the Governor now: (916) 445-2841 #ProtectPhoeun
item.source:markdown: URGENT: ICE is taking Cambodian #refugee, genocide survivor and #journalist Phoeun You to an airport for deportation. Only a pardon from @GavinNewsom can stop this. Call the Governor now: (916) 445-2841 #ProtectPhoeun

item.description: @DanielEstrin @NPR @diaahadid @tanisNPR @evilhag Really appreciated the reporting on the situation in Gaza. There's so much more for people like me to learn. Thank you.
item.source:markdown: @DanielEstrin @NPR @diaahadid @tanisNPR @evilhag Really appreciated the reporting on the situation in Gaza. There's so much more for people like me to learn. Thank you.
